name: Combat Rescue Guardian Angel 3
description:
Tough times has come to thumb people land. So far peaceful tribes are now conflicted in a war about fingerprints marking their land. This war has no end. Go ahead and become a pilot of Combat Rescue Guardian Angel chopper and bring helpless & desperate USB Army soldiers home. 

Escort wounded soldiers and civilians back to home base. Decide who's gonna be saved and who is gonna be doomed by a pumice.

Awesome enviro assets used in our game comes from EmacE Art. You can download them for free from Asset Store Link
